snippet: Saad Dawabsheh was severely burned in the July 31 firebombing that killed his 18-month-old son, Ali, for which Jewish extremists have been blamed.
abstract: Duma, West Bank, burial of Saad Dawabsheh is attended by thousands of Palestinians; father died of burns covering 80 percent of his body sustained in July 2015 firebombing of his home; assault, which also killed his 18-month-old son and badly burned other family members ,was condemned by both Israeli and Palestinian politicians who suspect Jewish extremists.

byline.original: By RAMI NAZZAL and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Rami Nazzal reported from Duma, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem. Diaa Hadid contributed reporting from Ramat Hasharon, Israel.

lead_paragraph: Saad Dawabsheh was severely burned in the July 31 firebombing that killed his 18-month-old son, Ali, for which Jewish extremists have been blamed.

headline.main: Father of Palestinian Toddler Killed in West Bank Arson Attack Dies in Hospital
headline.print_headline: West Bank Fire Attack Also Claims Boy’s Father
